model.utility

Class TurnStateHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.utility.TurnStateHandler

  • public class TurnStateHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    class with only static method, is used to handle queues and turnstates after particular actions

    • Constructor Summary

      TurnStateHandler()

      it handles what a player needs to do after having discarded a powerUp
      static void handleAfterReload(GameManager gameManager, Player player)
      it handles what a player needs to do after having reloaded a weapon (in action or at the end of the turn)

      method to add a player to the counterattacking queue.
      static void manageCounterAttackingQueue(GameManager gameManager, Player player)
      method to handle the counter attacking queue after a player has no other possible counter attack to use (or he has chosen not to use them).

      • manageCounterAttackingQueue

        public static void manageCounterAttackingQueue(GameManager gameManager,
                                               Player player)
        method to handle the counter attacking queue after a player has no other possible counter attack to use (or he has chosen not to use them).
        Parameters:
        gameManager -
        player - the current player of the counter attacking queue

      • manageAddCounterAttackingQueue

        public static void manageAddCounterAttackingQueue(Player player,
                                                  GameManager gameManager)
        method to add a player to the counterattacking queue. If the queue is empty then the current player is the one that he's going to choose first the possible counter attack. If it's not then the player is simply queued
        Parameters:
        player -
        gameManager -

      • afterPowerUpExecution

        public static void afterPowerUpExecution(Player player,
                                         GameManager gameManager,
                                         PowerUp powerUp)
        method to deal with the end of the powerUp execution
        Parameters:
        player - the player that has used the powerUp
        gameManager -
        powerUp - the current powerUp, whose execution is finished
